resources.string: Reset values to\nAndroid- or Settings default?
Press on color below to apply
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Allow to overwrite default value with user config
Use shake sensor value to trigger activation
Do you want to test shake sensor?
Configure shake strength required to trigger activation
Force showing time when there is no notification
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Enable to colorize the notification icons color
Notification text animation in the statusbar
Display the number of pending notifications
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Pressing the volume rocker up/down will wake the device
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
It is not possible to delete required buttons
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Home\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Where do you want the menu buttons to appear?
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Navigation bar height while in portrait.
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side.
Shows navigation bar in landscape on the bottom
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Reset all style entries to default?
Change the navigation bar button color mode
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Add, remove, and position items in the appbar
Position the Appbar on the left or right side of the screen
Display a visible tab on the side which will display the appbar when touched.
Display the tab on the top, middle, or bottom on the side of the screen.
Change the size of the visible tab.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Ability to apply color alpha value and make notification shade transparent.
Enable application management shortcuts in notification area and recent apps list
Dim navigation bar buttons after not interacting with navigation bar for a specified time
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before dimming buttons
Alpha value to dim buttons to
Duration (in milliseconds) of the alpha animation
Listen for touches on entire screen
Touching anywhere on the screen will cause buttons to un-dim
Only touches on the navbar will cause buttons to un-dim
Two main tiles on the first row
Enable advanced settings for location in quick settings
To configure and use system profiles, turn profiles on.
Writing a profile to a NFC tag allows for tapping the tag to select the profile. Tapping a second time will select the previously selected profile.
This NFC tag refers to an unknown profile. Attaching this NFC tag to an existing profile will allow for selecting the profile in the future.
Configure profile using current device settings?
Enter a name for the new profile
Delete all user created profiles and app groups and restore them to default?
An active profile cannot be deleted
Enter a name for the new app group
Enter primary email account and associated password to reset pattern lock
Triggers which will activate this profile
No Bluetooth devices paired.\nTap to pair Bluetooth device before configuring triggers.
No Wi-Fi access points configured.\nTap to connect Wi-Fi before configuring triggers.
No triggers configured. Tap to add more.
Tap to setup a new NFC trigger.
Please select triggers which will activate this profile
Now configure what happens when the profile is activated
Enables high-end visual effects such as transparent status/navigation bar (requires reboot)

These settings are included for experimentation and any changes made to them have the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss or hardware failures.\n\nWe request you do not file bug reports if any of these settings have been changed from the defaults.
Automatically choose an appropriate performance profile for various applications
Tap an icon on the left or right to reassign a lock screen shortcut.
